courses.who_for: Eligible licensed drivers receiving certain minor traffic citations (SOS notifies by letter).
requirements: Ticket must be for minor violation (3 points or less)
Complete within 60 days of SOS notice

submission.certificate: No need to submit; provider reports electronically to SOS
submission.reporting: Provider reports directly to SOS system

court_vs_insurance.court: Not a court program; SOS-administered alternative.
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Prevents ticket from being visible to insurers; not used for discounts.
